Package StateMachine

Interface Summary
LWRState Interface for the LWR States defining the Functions void CalcControlParam(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine), void SetACKString(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine) and void SetACKString(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine).So far realized States are: Idle, GravComp, Registration, SendData, WaitforData, Virtual Fixtures, PathImp, MovetoPose and Error.
 

Class Summary
LWRError The LWRError is a save State the robots is automatically set in if an error occurs.
LWRGravComp In This State the LWR is set to GravitationsCompensation mode so that robot can be moved without constraints
LWRIdle In This State the LWR is holding its position with a maximum stiffness.
LWRMoveToPose In This State the LWR is moving to a specified position in Cartesian space.
LWRPathImp In This State the LWR can be moved along a linear Path in one direction to a specified position in Cartesian space.
LWRStatemachine State machine class using the LWRState interface and its sub class/states.
LWRVirtualFixtures In this State two different kinds of Virtuall Fixtures, a plane and a cone are definied and the Stiffness and Damping values are calculated due to there distance to the defined Fixtures.
 

Enum Summary
LWRState.VisualIFDatatype In this Function control Mode Parameters are set and the commanded pose are calculated due the current LWR State.
LWRStatemachine.LWRStatus Current enum for the State Machine status {IDLE, GravComp, VirtualFixtures, PathImp, MovetoPose, Error}possible client states
